r.d:
This package provides an object oriented interface to GNU Privacy Guard (GnuPG). It requires the GnuPG executable to be on the system.
Though GnuPG can support symmetric-key cryptography, this package is intended only to facilitate public-key cryptography.
This package requires PHP version 5.2.1 or greater.
r.n: Feature and bug fix release. Changes include: * Better support for older versions of GnuPG. Fixes Bug #15906. * Added method to get GnuPG version. * New options to specify the location of the public keyring, secret keyring and trust database. Req #17005. * Added methods to encrypt and sign data in a single pass. Req #17004. * Added methods to decrypt and verify data in a single pass. Req #17004 * Added 'textmode' option to sign() and signFile() methods. Req #17006. * Fixed Bug #17174, handling verification of bad signatures. * Added fluent interface for UserId, Key, SubKey and Signature objects.
